• The case should have been discussed at a scheduled monthly perinatal mortality meeting, using the case to
highlight any lessons learnt, and to give feedback on progress with the initial action plan. Representatives
from all the referring clinics should be present at a hospital’s perinatal meeting. The DCST should also be
